data.actual_result: The slowmode info tooltip doesn't disappear
data.expected_result: The tooltip should disappear once you have removed your mouse from it.
data.short_description: Slowmode info tooltip doesn't disappear for the upload modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with slowmode being enabled (set it to a bigger time interval to notice the bug) - Make sure you don't have manage channels or manage messages permission - Send a message - Click on the "+" button to upload something - Mouseover the upload button - Remove your mouse from the button
